Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.i5Xz1hjImCHirF7l]{Machine Gun Specialist}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.3sr5p717BmTjji8x]{Machine Gun Reloader}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.iGdDH3k6zt6mBOsA]{General Purpose Machine Gunner}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.46U1CPOMY8hwoZSD]{Close Combat Machine Gunner} and @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.M8kz2bDgEqr4YIab]{Machine Gun Ace} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.cOTShCg835OHoITD]{Machine Gun Expert}

Benefit

When wielding an a LMG or GPMG the Critical Threat range for any of these weapons is 15-18

Normal

The Critical Threat range for all firearms is 16-18.

Special

If a character selects the Machine Gun Master Feat, they may not select the Machine Gun Savant Feat
